title: Refund
body: about a week or 2 ago, i purchased Lucian, i played about 10 games with him, i studied him, and i realized how much of a mistake i had made. I don't like him, and i am wondering, is there any way i can get another refund?

replies.body: There are no ways of obtaining additional refunds tokens.

This is correct. Every account is essentially given 3 "get out of jail free" cards to skirt the No refund policy. If you've used all your tokens, there are no opportunities to gain more. I personally recommend trying out a champ on the free champion rotation or watching an in-depth review prior to committing to purchasing the champ.

This information is covered in our [Content Refund FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h2q2) Let me know if you have any questions.

It would be nice if it was easier to view content (skins and to some degree champions) before purchase in the client or something without having to go to third party sites and stuff (which new players probably don't even know about?)
